tasks.label: Setup Python venv
args: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then python3 -m venv .venv; fi; source .venv/bin/activate; if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; fi; echo 'venv ready'
if (-not (Test-Path .venv)) { python -m venv .venv }; & .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; if (Test-Path requirements.txt) { pip install -r requirements.txt }; Write-Output 'venv ready'
